name: River Raiding
description:
This is a River Raid style game which is an endless runner/flyer type game.  Shoot enemies/ bridges and fill up your fuel tank by flying over the fuel objects. Be careful not to run out of fuel.

Controls

left: left cursor / a

right: right cursor / d 

speed up : up cursor / w

slow down : down cursor / s 

fire: control(Ctrl)

Tip: Fly slowly over the fuel objects to gain more fuel.

Credits:
